message: Hello Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $12,500. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings, and I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $12,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I'm confident it's still a fair price for the value the product brings.
I appreciate your concession, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider this price?
